Ist an sich ein gutes Spiel aber wenn man ein bisschen spielt merkt man, dass man doch schon eine menge echt Geld ausgeben muss um ein bisschen mehr Inhalte oder ein größeres Spielerlebnis zu bekommen. Ich brauche schon Geld um das Spiel überhaupt spielen zu können, da wäre es in meinen Augen auch vernünftig wenn nicht so viel noch hinterher nachgekauft werden muss. Das fühlt sich für mich so an als würde ich mir nur den Rohling des Spiel kaufen ohne viel Inhalt. Das Spiel wird von sehr vielen gespielt also sind die Wartezeiten auch ok. Kann es Neulingen nicht empfehlen.

Dead By Daylight is a love/hate relationship. The game is fun, especially with friends, but at the same time, the game has it lows. Some of those lows are hit boxes and dedicated servers because in some situations, you will get hit and you are not sure whether or not you believe you got hit, but it will reward the killer for the hit and that can be frustrating for you at times. I feel that those are the reasons why people get frustrated at the game. But for me, I love this game because I like the concept of the game and that they are always updating the game with new content but if the developers want to keep the game more relevant in the long run, you will either need to improve the hit boxes and the dedicated servers because I believe that is what holding the game back are those issues I stated. I'm not worried about the new content of the game because there are lots of horror content you can add in the game that I am not concern about. If not, you could make a new Dead by Daylight game, but that is not likely to happen. Overall, I will love/hate the game but I will always find a way to comeback and play this game and I will recommend you buying this game when its on sale. I will not get it for $20, but wait for the sale because it will be cheap and it is always on sale when there is a steam sale of some sort.

Unbalanced game in every aspect , Sided by killers mostly, by default is very very easy to play as a killer you are faster , your perks are  notable in each match, you have add ons that let you see the survivors freely and add ons with infinite killing in one hit, besides that the killer have many advantages over the surivor , the killer can even see you in the lobby and notice if you have items at hand giving him the privilage to use a perk to make these survivors throw their items in the floor changing his perks in the lobby before a match, when the survivor dont even have a chance to know who is the killer thing that wasnt like this, at the very beggining of this game survivors used to have a sound of the killer at the very beggining to be aware who was the killer , the camping issue is something from day one thing that they will never fix or find a solution to it because the creator said that was a strategy used in game if I receive this quote from the creator what else can we expect from this unbalanced game? nothing... all the perks from the survivors are circumstantial and you will need a lot of skill and learning on being a survivor to use a survivor and all the survivors are the same none is faster than the other none everybody can learn the perks and everybody is the same, is not an hack and slash like being a killer, and the worst thing about this the development team doesnt do a shit because its bringing them money yes, these kids and casual gamers using killers and thinking they are good are making  them rich and as long as they are happy they will have their money and they will be happy and end of the story. As you can see I am not a noob I have my hours playing this game and the only thing that motivates me to play is the fact that a I can try to escape from an underminded killer who is faster stronger  and take advantages of the perks that are so used and changes everything in the match like Ruin is there any killer who doesnt use this perk at all? no every killer use it... these creators make their gaming experince happy. I dont recommend the game honestly. I deleted this piece of crap and now I am playing Identity V the kids can stay making streams and videos I am out.

в эту игру можно поиграть,но очень не долго играть просто не возможно,если хочешь поиграть за выжевшего то вам в 4ом надо завести 5 генераторов которые заводятся по 10мин мало этого за вами идет охотник .он быстрее вас  он сильнее вас у вас нет шансов сбежать нет не единой перки что-бы были шансы на спасение и мало этого надо спасать и своих союзников и у охотников у каждого есть особенности хотя они и так во всем сильнее,а если хотите поиграть за охотника ,то ждите 20мин пока найдется игра (я только про гимплей есть еще минусы,но надеюсь мой отзыв был полезен ) не советую

Me gusta, es adictivo i divertido pero tiene mcuhas cosas que hay que mejorar. El juego en si no esta balacaneado, es ridiculamente fácil avanzar como superviviente y difícil como killer a partir del rango 8. El matchmaking empareja bastante injustamente dando desventaja muchas veces al killer. Además jugar en equipo (comunicación) da mucha ventaja a los supervivientes contra lo que el killer mcuhas veces no puede hacer nada. Basicamente si vas a comprar y jugar este juego, hazlo con amigos o simplemente juega superviviente.

Defino esse jogo em uma palavra "Desbalanceado" você vai ficar com muito raiva e impotente que só resta sentar e esperar perder.
